workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: Identifier of Workgroup to filter results by.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

name.name: name
name.description: Name of VRF to filter results by.
name.validation_error_text: Parameter name only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: get_vrfs
description: Returns a list of Layer3 Connections.
